medical_history.chief_complaint: Diarrhea for 3 days and right lower quadrant pain with nausea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Mr. ___ experienced diarrhea for 3 days, followed by 1 day of right lower quadrant pain and nausea. He felt dizzy at 6PM on ___ and experienced vomiting by 9PM. He last had a meal at 7:30PM the night before, which he vomited, and then drank water at 1AM this morning, which he kept down. He had a liquid bowel movement at 1AM this morning. Currently, he still has pain, but nausea/vomiting has resolved after receiving anti-emetic.
medical_history.family_history: No significant history of bleeding/clotting, GI malignancy, or other abnormalities, IBD.
